snippet: Company officials said they were unsure how Mayor Michael R. Bloomberg’s plan to ban sales of big sugary drinks might jibe with the milkshake-style coffee drinks that are popular at their stores.
abstract: New York City's Board of Health has yet to determine how Mayor Michael R Bloomberg's plan to restrict sales of large-size sugary drinks in New York City will impact Starbucks; plan exempts any beverage that is more than 50 percent milk by volume, but Starbucks offerings are complicated because they are customized and amount of ice, milk and sugar can vary with each order.
lead_paragraph: Company officials said they were unsure how Mayor Michael R. Bloomberg’s plan to ban sales of big sugary drinks might jibe with the milkshake-style coffee drinks that are popular at their stores.

headline.seo: At Starbucks, Uncertainty Over Mayor’s Drink Plan
headline.main: At Starbucks, Uncertainty Over Impact of Bloomberg’s Drink Plan
headline.print_headline: At Starbucks, Uncertainty Over Impact of Bloomberg’s Drink Plan
